You didn't see or hear this coming

The World's first 4-view Media Machine.
Better than 3D without the glasses.

HYDROGEN One
Media Machine

RED HYDROGEN One

Basis partnered with RED to develop a responsive website and Android mobile for the launch of the world's first 4-view Meida MAchine

Basis was responsible for tech & development of the e-commerce site when the HYDROGEN One first hit the international market - available via partnerships with AT&T, Verizon, and Telcel.

Additionaly, Basis built HYDROGEN One's entertainment network, dedicated to providing device owners with exclusive 4-view content.

Available as an Android App, Basis also architected an extensive back-end admin to provide content owners and studios with tools to manage titles, monetization, and metrics tied to their entertainment offerings.

Ohio State
Buckeye Nation Rewards

The Ohio State University

Buckeye Nation Rewards — Website & iOS/Android App

Basis partnered with The Ohio State University to design and develop an official loyalty rewards platform for students, alumni, faculty/staff, and fans of the University — Buckeye Nation Rewards.

Anyone can join to earn points, or “GoBucks,” which are collected by engaging with content, watching videos, participating in quizzes or sharing University or sponsored content on social. Participants earn entry into sweepstakes and contests offering exclusive rewards including University merchandise, exotic trips, and tickets to concerts and University-backed sporting events.

California Cryobank
World's Largest Donor Database

California Cryobnk

Suite of Reproductive Service Web Properties & Customer Databases, Branding & Collateral

California Cryobank, an international reproductive and life sciences company, contacted us for a quick reboot of a handful of web pages. Noticing a variety of limitations with their technology, we suggested a full audit of their web properties. Our audit found many areas in which their technologies had potential to boost their business

After interviewing key stakeholders and executives to round out an encompassing audit, we stabilized their properties by rebuilding their application to accomodate current standards, redesigning their website to be responsive with a modern look, and creating a data warehouse to store all customer information and marketing material.

Our partnership has delivered a yearly savings of nearly 50% on CCB's budget and contributed a to 5x increase in work output. Now considered a strategic partner, we continue to advise them in all aspects of their dgital businee- including SEO, analysis and design/development.

WHO WE ARE

We are a full-service independent agency partnering with clients to provide creative solutions in marketing and technology across the entire project lifecycle.

WHAT WE DO

Our team uses insights, data, and results to inform the design and build of digital products, brands, and experiences. We are comprised of professionals with expertise in web development, computer science, art direction, and design.

WHERE WE ARE

Our office is located in downtown Los Angeles. If you are interested in working with us, for us, or if you just want to say hello, please feel free to contact us.
